mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(bno, reply, replyer) values(#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply=#{reply}, updatedate = now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bno > (select max(bno)-10000 from tbl_reply) order by bno desc limit ${skip}, #{display}
select count(bno) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
